snippet.title: [OP] Your Dry Delight
snippet.description:
Your Dry Delight is a FREE BL/yaoi game from Argent Games!

Summary:
Richter and his boss, Leslie, are detectives hired to help throttle the liquor business in 1920s Cleveland, Ohio. However, when Richter catches the eye of a charismatic mob boss, a different story falls into place...

Play for FREE on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/913010/Your_Dry_Delight/

Play for FREE on Itch.io:
https://argent-games.itch.io/your-dry-delight

=====

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/argent_games

Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/argentgames

Join our Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/5SrFgVY
